summary: For years we've reported on the F-35 program's cost and schedule overruns, knowledge gaps, and performance issues. Although DOD has taken a number of steps to address these concerns, the department continues to struggle to keep the development costs for the baseline aircraft in check—raising questions about DOD's plan to make significant investments in developing new F-35 capabilities. Our recommendation ? Before committing dollars to...
title: F-35 Joint Strike Fighter: DOD Needs to Complete Developmental Testing Before Making Significant New Investments
